title: [Health] Organic Meat Less Likely To Be Contaminated with Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria. The researchers found that, compared to conventionally processed meats, organic-certified meats were 56 percent less likely to be contaminated with multidrug-resistant bacteria.

[Neuroscience] How the brain encodes information socially enables us to distinguish between collaborative, caring personalities and those that are less empathic. Individuals with high levels of agreeableness can discern social contents that are important, and informative, for achieving successful interactions
